item.title: How I Learn Anything Quickly
item.description: As a software developer, you are probably well aware of the feeling: You are overwhelmed by the amount of interesting stuff you want to test and learn. But I’m sure that this problem is also very common in other fields. If you feel like me, you may read and watch various books, blog articles or online courses, but you won’t really keep much of their contents. In today’s article, I’d like to help you to learn more effectively about the topics that really interest you, wasting less time.
